EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Anthony, That would be great, I would love to talk to him. Please send him my way and thanks for the referral! ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Anthony Schroepfer [mailto:anthony_schroepfer@yahoo.com] Sent: Friday, March 30, 2012 1:11 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Hi Hi Sara, I have a colleague that is going independent and is interested in using MBO. Should I have him contact you? Thanks, Anthony
--- On Tue, 2/21/12, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote: From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> Subject: RE: Hi To: "Anthony Schroepfer" <anthony_schroepfer@yahoo.com <mailto:anthony_schroepfer@yahoo.com>> Date: Tuesday, February 21, 2012, 11:27 AMHi Anthony, I work as a Consultant Services Advisor at MBO now. My primary role is speaking with people who are interested in using MBO and helping them determine if it is the right fit. I act as a business manager for them for their first two payrolls and then hand them off to a long term business manager once they are comfortable with the process. So the short answer is yes, I still work as a business manager for consultants that I bring on. Is there something you needed help with? Thanks, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Anthony Schroepfer [mailto:anthony_schroepfer@yahoo.com] <http://us.mc1257.mail.yahoo.com/mc/compose?to=sconde@mbopartners.com> Sent: Tuesday, February 21, 2012 10:48 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Hi Hi Sara, Do you still work at MBO as a business manager? Thanks, Anthony </htm
